description:
NEW SERIES! He was one of the rebellious gladiator-slaves crucified by the Romans for being part of Spartacus’s uprising, and in his dying moments he called out to the gods for vengeance. Something heard him, and brought him back from the dead in exchange for his soul. He is Aquila, and he is now the unstoppable instrument of Ammit the Devourer, who hungers for the souls of evil men – and Aquila will keep feeding her until his debt has been paid!

A stunning new series from writer Gordon Rennie (Rogue Trooper, Dept of Monsterology) and Leigh Gallagher (Defoe, Judge Dredd).

A 5 issue mini-series. Double-thick cover stock.

Theresa woke up to find herself changing into a monster. She's taken from her family and put into an internment camp with other kids going through the same thing. She is given a choice: she can surrender to becoming a mindless beast, or join Behemoth, a pack of creatures trained to kill for the U.S. government. But which choice will make her more of a monster?

This is a smart, funny graphic novel exploring the life, legend, and lore of two of the greatest poets in Chinese history - Han Shan (known as "Cold Mountain") and Shih Te - who lived during the Tang dynasty (618-906 CE). They were critics of authority (both secular and religious) and champions of social justice who left their poetry on tree trunks and rocks. They were also reportedly monastics, drunks, cave dwellers, immortals, and many other wild and wondrous things. Sean Michael Wilson has brought these renegade poets to life, showing the places they went and the philosophical and meditative aspects of their lives, as well as revealing their humor and wackiness and their penetrating insights into the human condition.
name: GN

volume.name: Cold Mountain: The Legend of Han Shan and Shih Te the Original Dharma Bums

description: When a mysterious space-time phenomenon causes 600 years of human history to collapse into a single era, societies from the past, present and future are forced to coexist in a dystopian civilization. While investigating a secret field hospital hidden deep within a cave, Johannes and his officers discover an unhealthy dose of futuristic contraband. Hot on the trail of the black market kingpin Dr. Tomorrow, the Resynchronization team is suddenly ambushed by a militia from every corner of time. Can these outnumbered officers defeat their foes and fight their way to their ultimate target: the Salesman?

Executive Assistant Iris returns!

Aspen's first Executive Assistant Annual ever is jam packed with three brand new stories featuring the most popular Executive Assistants! The EA that started it all, Iris, returns for a thrilling new adventure that explores her new life beyond the conflict of her past! Also, explore fan favorite EA Rose's tumultuous history with her overbearing master, plus a brutal prison tale featuring the popular EA Orchid!

Don't miss out on the debut of the first ever EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT IRIS ANNUAL #1 in this thrilling oversized issue featuring a re-mastered EA IRIS cover by original series designer Joe Benitez and colorist Peter Steigerwald!

Contents

  • Part One: Rose
  • Part Two: The Chance
  • Part Three: Scar Tissue
  • Part Four: Executive Assistant

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
ADirect CoverJoe Benitez (a) & Peter Steigerwald (c)1
BBig Wow! ComicFest Exclusive Cover, Limited to 200Siya Oum2

Old West outlaw Ichabod Azrael continues his grievous journey across the deadlands, intent on returning to the world of the living – but those that enforce the underworld are desperate to have him stopped, and summon The Hunter to end him once and for all... More dark and stylish supernatural gun-slinging from writer Rob Williams (The Royals: Masters of War, Doctor Who) and artist Dom Reardon (The Ten-Seconders, Caballistics, Inc.). Featuring an amazing cover by Nick Percival, plus a black white variant cover by Dom Reardon.

A standalone mini-series. Double-thick cover stock.

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverNick Percival1
VarVariant CoverDom Reardon2

volume.name: The Grievous Journey of Ichabod Azrael

description: 1939 Manchuria. The Empire of Japan is in control and ruthless experiments are being conducted on human subjects. The Harvester is dispatched with unexpected orders. Will he follow Teo Dan's orders or risk extending his tormenting journey through his own brand of purgatory? In the present, Parsons' discovery of a violent death yielding the key to capturing the soul leads him to a new source of subjects: death row inmates.

Josh Blaylock's now classic How-To prose book about the business of comics publishing, after selling out of its updated 2012 edition, is now being re-released to include Tim Seeley's companion writings on the behind-the-scenes realities of being a comic book artist, originally released in pamphlet form.
name: TPB

volume.name: How To Self Publish Comics Master Edition

description: The adventure issue! "Cruzader, Agent of the Vatican" runs deadly missions for the pope! "The Professional(s) kick butt to save a city and build a legend! A mysterious hooded cult appears for "The Harvest!" We investigate a brutal murder in "The Case of the Misused Grant!" Microman is let go from his super-group in "The Downsizing of Quentin Mykroh!" Uncle Pat reveals the story of a maiden, disease, Conquistadors and death, in "The Womanatee!" Heresy shall not be tolerated as the Astral Crusaders return! Plus, we introduce "Toots Malloy, Blues Ninja!" Omar Morales, Ramon Gil, Terry Cronin, Devastating Roulette Studios, Guys 'N' Ties, Paul Bradford, Marta Tanrikulu, Troy Vevasis, and a monstrous cover by Gary Scott Beatty!

A landmark issue as Emma Beeby becomes the first woman to write our top female character – Judge Anderson! Mutineers by Beeby, Andrew Currie, and Eva de la Cruz begins in this issue of the Judge Dredd Megazine! PLUS Judge Dredd: The Cop by Al Ewing, Ben Willsher, and Adam Brown approaches its shattering conclusion; there’s more American Reaper III by Pat Mills and Clint Langley; the Cursed Earth saga of Angelic by Gordon Rennie and Lee Carter concludes; and a preview of Holocaust 12 by John Smith and Jim Murray. Plus the usual features, interviews and more, and in the bagged graphic novel this month is the second!

Cover: Siku

  • Judge Dredd - The Cop (Part Four) (Al Ewing - Ben Willsher)
  • Reaper Files (Pat Mills - Clint Langley)
  • Anderson Psi-Divison - Mutineers (Part One) (Emma Beeby - Andrew Currie)
  • Angelic (Part Four) (Gordon Rennie - Lee Carter)

Graphic Novel - Black Siddha: Return of the Jester (Cover: Simon Davis)

  • Black Siddha - Return of the Jester (Pat Mills - Simon Davis)
  • Harlem Heroes (Part Three) (Michael Fleisher - Steve Dillon - Kevin Walker)
name: Meg 359

description: This multiple award-winning comic magazine features the hilarious misadventures of a group of gamers (the Knights) and their friends, along with useful role-playing and other articles for gamers, from a gamer's perspective. It's a slice of (fantasy) life in strips, articles, reviews and features, and a wonderful celebration of the gaming culture!

The Games are already underway when Richard Aldana arrives in town. This mysterious stranger seems to have more in common with our world than the world where the Games are held. He smokes cigarettes and wears a leather jacket while everyone else in this medieval realm is casting spells and weaving tapestries. Nobody knows what to make of him, but when Aldana enrolls in the games he quickly becomes a top contender. Eschewing magic and using only his martial arts prowess, Aldana also befriends and protects a small boy for reasons as mysterious as his origins. Who will win the games? Who is Richard Aldana, really? And what is the ultimate purpose of this gruelling gladiatorial contest?
name: The Stranger

description: Nestled in the grass under the big palm tree by the edge of the desert there is an entire civilization, a civilization of beetles where beetles write books, run restaurants, and even do scientific research. But not too much scientific research is allowed by the elders, who guard a terrible secret about the world outside. Lucy is not one to quietly cooperate, however. This tiny field scientist defies the law of her home and leads a team of researchers out into the desert. Their mission is to discover something about the greater world - but what lies in wait for them is going to change everything. Beetles are not the only living creatures in the world.
name: GN

description: Alex Sullivan is a normal kid. He goes to school, has a job working at his parent's restaurant, and struggles to fit in. Then one day when he goes in for a routine medical procedure his life changes; tests show he has biology inside of him that the doctors have never seen before. They don't know what it is. They just know that it's not human. Agents from a shadowy government organization appear at the hospital, and after Alex escapes he goes on the run to try to find out who he really is and uncover the shocking history that his parents have kept hidden from him. With the help of a nurse from the hospital, they begin to learn the secrets of his past and ultimately what their futures will be in this fast-paced thriller that explores what it really means to be human.
name: Volume 1

description: Steam technology has advanced Victorian society greatly, but crime keeps apace too. An elderly noble is found mysteriously dead, and his only heir may be next. London's celebrated steampunk sleuth is summoned, and he brings all his brilliance to bear. But is this killer truly an ancient curse, or something far more modern and metallic?

volume.name: Sherlock Holmes, Steam Detective: The Baskerville Boilerbeast

description: Your favorite characters from Adventures in Cartooning are back in this adorable paper-over-board picture book! The Knight can't wait for her first camping trip! She and her horse Edward pack everything they need - including her beloved Teddy - and head out into the woods. But when it's time for bed, Teddy is nowhere to be found! A helpful racoon thinks this "Teddy" sounds familiar and sends the Knight off to a cave, but that's no teddy bear in that cave. That's a real bear!
name: HC

description:
Monsters and mayhem take over in The Official Star Trek Magazine! It's time to strip off our Starfleet uniforms, don skimpy leather armor, and swap our phasers for flaming swords, as we delve into the classical themes, myths, and legends that have influenced Star Trek over the decades. We'll also find out how Trek couture is becoming high fashion; meet the galaxy's most notorious rogues and reprobates; and discover how Gary Seven faced off against Khan during the Eugenics Wars! Plus all of your favorite regular features, merchandise reviews, and the latest Star Trek news.

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegNewsstand CoverPhoto1
REPreviews Exclusive CoverPhoto2

The showdown you've been waiting for! It's our Zombie Punks versus the Westboro Baptist Church in an all-out gorefest battle royale! Who will live? Who will die? What do Shirley Phelps' guts look like? What part will Fall Out Boy's Andy Hurley play now that he's joined the band and gone full-zombie? How absolutely friggin' insanely awesome will this issue be? All those questions answered in this final blood soaked masterpiece of comedic comic book carnage named Toe Tag Riot!
name: The Wondrous Butchering of Westboro

description: The villains and fugitives of the world are feeling the heat from the Steam Hunters! These beauteous, brass-bound bounty hunters are ever prepared to reap their rewards by bagging the baddies, dead or alive. Buckle on your best leather, strap your goggles on tight, and keep your spare Tesla charges handy!

From the pages of Shadowflame and War of the Independents #3, Kane has recruited Maldestrak to hold the Hammer of Thor and defeat the universe's strongest beings. In return, Maldestrak asks only that he be allowed to take revenge on his enemy, Shadowflame. The Mighty Titan and Shadowflame team up to fight one of the most powerful beings in the universe. All of this while Titan is fighting cancer and Shadowflame is recovering from his battle with Atomico! At last, Maldestrak will have his vengeance!

Far outside of town, the Vault Hunter receive a last-minute warning from Tannis that a dangerous warlord is on their tail and he's out for blood! In the exciting conclusion of Tannis and the Vault, Lilith, Mordecai, Roland, and Brick will face their toughest challenge yet.

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverAgustin Padilla (a) & Esther Sanz (c)1
SubSubscription CoverRoberto Goiriz2

Johnny Ryan's utterly unpretentious taboo-tackling is an infectious and hilarious bombardment of political incorrectness, taking full advantage of the medium's absurdist potential for maximum laughs. In an age when the medium is growing up and aspiring to more mature and hoity-toity literary heights, Ryan builds on the visceral tradition that cartooning has had on our collective funny bone for over a century. Now, for the first time, all fourteen issues of Ryan's career-defining comic book series Angry Youth Comix (2000-2008) are collected in one place. All the comics, the covers, and even the contentious letters pages, in one toilet-ready brick shithouse.
name: HC

description: Not a tougher, colder, more feared killer enforces the streets of Baltimore than the man they call Monster. Break the rules and the last thing you're likely to see is what's pressed hard up against the inside of his steady black eyes—rage...the true monster, trying to rip and claw its way out from the inside. With an ironclad will and a robotic efficiency, Monster has never let the beast out unchecked. Today, though, his supreme control is going to be tested. The Finger has taken down one of his people, he's lost a vital shipment of Harry's drugs, his neighbor's dog is on its third week of dying loudly, and the one girl who's seen his other side and come away unscathed—the girl that made the monster—is about to walk back into his life and twist his head around once again...
name: Mr. Sunshine

description: The Year of Groo marches on, as Groo marches right into Arcadio the Hero. Arcadio’s in the protection business, teaching villagers how to protect themselves from dragons . . . but he should be teaching them to protect themselves from Groo! Feather-brained barbarian thrills from the award-winning team of Sergio Aragonés and Mark Evanier, with Stan Sakai and Tom Luth.

Humanity has been overthrown. Mutated animals run amuck in a post-apocalyptic world. Think you’ve seen this type of thing before? Well, not the way TED McKEEVER tells it. Follow the last remaining human, HE, as he encounters every manner of bizarreness the devastated town of Blackwater has to offer, in this collection of McKEEVER’s brooding, darkly humorous series, The Superannuated Man. Plus, it contains a substantial amount of bonus material, including . . . doodles.
name: TPB

description:
After a tense run-in with the Archduke's soldiers leaves Diego wounded, Django finds that he must step into the black costume and mask to operate in Zorro's stead. He soon discovers that what he thought of as a simple bodyguard job has forced him to confront a grim and all-too familiar enemy-the specter of slavery. Meanwhile, the ever-wily Diego lays the seeds of a trap for the greedy Archduke. Quentin taratino's first original foray into comics draws closer to its dramatic conclusion, scripted by Eisner Award winner Matt Wagner, artist Esteve pol and colorist Brennan Wagner. one more issue to go until the grand finale...

List of covers and their creators:

C/SubSubscription CoverMoritat3

F/RI1:50 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" CoverJae Lee6

name: Write in Candidate King Kong Sweeps Election!

volume.name: Prince Valiant in the Days of King Arthur
Atomic Chili: The Illustrated Joe R. Lansdale

description: Sela struggles to find someway to rescue Robb from the clutches of the people who have been chasing them. Can she find a way back to shore and discover where he’s being held captive, and if so, will they both manage to escape alive? Find out in this thrilling conclusion to the first arc.

name: Year 3 Since 9-11 and I'm in Sechelt...

person_credits.name: Colin Upton
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, cover, production

description: In the concluding chapter of "Who is Wonder Woman?" Diana squares off against her mysterious tormentor who then summons an army of enemies to attack her.
name: "Who is Wonder Woman?" Part 3 of 3: "Psycho-Therapy"

description: U.S. Army Captain Carter has a lot on his mind... a fierce battle in the North threatens frontline Soldiers but their resupply convoy has been ambushed by Red Coin insurgents. Carter's QRF team needs to extricate that convoy ASAP but his Platoon Sergeant has been thrown in the stockade. And if that wasn't enough, a massive storm has grounded flights and threatens the entire mission. Carter will need to make fast, sharp decisions to rescue the Soldiers and get those supplies to the front lines in America's Army #15 - Decide to Lead PT. 3 : Transformation.
name: Decide To Lead, Pt. 3: Transformation

volume.name: Prince Valiant in the Days of King Arthur

description: With his kingdom and his people at risk, King Nigel and the Knights of Northwind face Orlik and his Mammonites on the battlefield. As victory for Northwind looms, the mysterious Alius Rex enters the fray to devastating results...

Threads of Ambiguity

Chapter 04 of Avaiyo, Vol. 01

After centuries of slavery under the oppressive rule of the Tamiran Empire, the people of Xiltria could no longer bear such anguish. Through immeasurable losses and hardships, these suffering victims were finally able to win back their lands. By forming militias and unifying all slaves together under one flag they were eventually able to crush the Tamiran Empire who had conquered the world so long ago. The people now had a fresh start in life. With their new "free world" they finally have a chance to get what they've wanted from the very start...peace.

Their dreams have been realized. Regions. Countries. Nations have been restored to their former glory. All of Xiltria now works together. With their continued efforts to reshape the world it is a time of prosperity. However, the seeds of evil have endured. In the underbelly of society, subtle remnants of the exiled Tamiran Empire still live on...and are starting to give way towards a new threat.

It's been nearly eight years since the citizens of Xiltria regained their freedom. Sekken, a young man who lived through the carnage, travels the world in an attempt to suppress any threats that could endanger this new "free world."
name: Threads of Ambiguity

description: Loki has his eyes on the Asgardian treasures...and only the Avengers can stop him! Will Earth's Mightiest Heroes be able to thwart a heist from the Trickster God himself?
name: Asgard On Ice

description: News of more brutal murders in Los Angeles spread as Rory, Mossy, and George decide that they have to take action before Charlie Manson and his "Family" show up again. Before they can confront the Family directly, they decide to head to the Spahn movie ranch to raid Manson's armory of weapons. But all does not go as planned.
name: Chapter 6

description: As Lucius Fox recovers from his injuries, Batman and Robin prepare for the coming onslaught and search for the motive behind Harley Quinn's latest attack.
name: You Can Fight City Hall Part 3 of 3

description:
Join the Menace campaign! Help Dennis get his dad elected mayor and stop Walter's Dad's Beanotown takeover!

What else is happening this week?

  • A FREE secret disguise kit!
  • Learn Minnie's messy bedroom trick - you'll never have to clean your room again!
  • Grow your own doughnuts in our tasty prank!

PLUS... puzzles, comps and 18 LOL comics! Don't miss it!

Very Bad Things

Fresh and Mack, two licensed and sanctioned hitmen, took an unauthorized job, illegally infiltrating a secret government safe house and making off with the very valuable information in the brain of a rogue scientist, only to have their prize hijacked by a rival Hitter.
name: Very Bad Things

description:
Introduced by your host, The Bloke, a Victorian undertaker, who I dress as at conventions to promote the magazine. Bloke's Terrible Tomb of Terror is a homage to the classic horror anthology magazines that we grew up loving.

This is an ongoing, self-published series, with eleven issues currently available and two collected editions. Voted Best Anthology Of 2013 in the Ghastly Awards.

The fourth issue features five stories with a mix of retro and modern art styles.
Chopstick and Tracy head into the city, but are soon separated as the night's events begin to unravel, and Chopstick makes a detour that will lead to an unexpected encounter.

The New Years Edition

It's New Years 1999 and the clock is nearing midnight. Will the clock strike 12 and Armageddon ensue? (Probably not. But, It's interesting to think about.) What does the future hold for us and did this country take a turn for the worst with Reagan?
name: The New Years Edition

description: Amber and The Endling finally face off against Rafe.
The devastating final act.

With Kashi Isle's balance restored, Achea sets her sights on "the Orchard of Life," Vapell Viji. The prosperous nation is famed for its delicious cuisine-but a warm bed and a good meal is farther away than everyone thinks! Formidable adversaries calling themselves The Edel Raid Training, Protection, and Subjugation Squad stand in Achea's way, and it might take unexpected aid from a familiar face to clear the path to Vapell Viji.

Chapter Titles

  • Di-No 8: Kashi Isle, Spring of Pure Love ~Bountiful Blessings of Rainbow Mist~
  • Di-No 9: Zeg Vogel ~Rippling Black Wing~
  • Di-No 10: Zeg Vogel ~Fluttering Black Bird~
  • Di-No 11: Zeg Vogel ~Glorious Black Talon~
  • Di-No 12: Zeg Vogel ~The Two Eyes of Jet-Black and Black Kite~
  • Di-No 13: Zeg Vogel ~The Song of Falling Attack~
name: Vol. 3

description:
The long journey to Vapell Viji has finally come to an end. Unfortunately, the company arrives in the land renowned for its delicious cuisine while it is in the midst of some dire circumstances. Not long after their arrival the Princess Achea and her companions witness the orchard of life deteriorate! Many trials arise for Achea, once she offers aid to the queen of Vapell Viji and their dying tree.

Chapter Titles

  • Di-No 14: Zeg Vogel, The Training, Protection, And Subjugation Squad ~A Rupture of the Black Beak~
  • Di-No 15: Zeg Vogel, The Training, Protection, And Subjugation Squad ~Engraved Black Scratch~
  • Di-No 16: Vapell Viji, The Orchard of Life ~The Thousand Blessings of Kayui~
  • Di-No 17: Vapell Viji, The Orchard of Life ~Branches Lost In Mist~
  • Di-No 18: Vapell Viji, The Orchard of Life ~Lament of the Great Tree~
  • Di-No 19: Vapell Viji, The Orchard of Life ~A Promise Hiding In the Leaves~
  • Di-No 20: Vapell Viji, The Orchard of Life ~Branch of the Abundant Tree~
name: Vol. 4

description:
The Emotional Lives of Engineers Part 1

What was to be a relaxing vacation turns frantic when agents Shae Batiste and cyborg Albertron Toomes confront an AI bent on plummeting space-faring travelers to their deaths on a tethered space elevator. How will they disable this mysterious circuit that seemingly gained consciousness -and- a grudge? Who is this mysterious IEEE agent, Hung Tran, who seemed quite aware of Shae's whereabouts? Are his intentions towards Shae purely romantic? Will he drive a wedge between our two heroes?

What will he do when Shae Batiste inexplicably loses consciousness for no apparent reason while struggling to control the nefarious AI?
name: The Emotional Lives of Engineers Part 1

description:
A grizzled detective haunted by his failures, an outer space marshal facing down corporate corruption, an unlucky man meets an even unluckier man on a lonely stretch of road...these three tales of larceny and lawbreaking make up the meat of Felony Comics #2, the follow up to last year's critically acclaimed first issue.

Also features a tale of children's crime by junior crime expert Benjamin Urkowitz (Real Rap Comics) and a DIGITAL EXCLUSIVE pinup by Amy Searles (Night Burgers, Jeans).

The cover is by the award winning Rich Tommaso (Pete & Miriam, Dry Country), and the stories are by Pete Toms (Ignatz nominee and The Best American Comics 2014 Notable for On Hiatus), Josh Burggraf (with the latest chapter of his ongoing epic Kid Space Heater), Harris Smith (editor of Felony Comics, Night Burgers and Jeans) and Thomas Slattery (Moth).

Harvey's past comes back to haunt Project Phoenix in the guise of a new threat. As tensions mount, Brett and his team must prepare themselves for the fight of their lives. They just don't know it yet.
